item.title: filepath.Walk로 디렉토리 순회하기
item.description: https://pkg.go.dev/path/filepath#Walk 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 // func Walk(root string, fn WalkFunc) error err := filepath.Walk(root, // type WalkFunc func(path string, info fs.FileInfo, err error) error func(path string, info fs.FileInfo, err error) error { // do what you want to do with each file/directory, including root } )
